thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Mplx Announces Joint Binding Open Season For Cushing-To-Patoka Pipeline Expansion

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mplx Announces Joint Binding Open Season For Cushing-To-Patoka Pipeline Expansion
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Mplx Lp:
* MPLX ANNOUNCES JOINT BINDING OPEN SEASON FOR CUSHING-TO-PATOKA PIPELINE EXPANSION
* MPLX LP SAYS UNITS COMMENCED JOINT BINDING OPEN SEASON ON COMBINED OZARK 22-INCH & WOODPAT 22-INCH PIPELINES FROM OKLAHOMA TO ILLINOIS
* MPLX LP - JOINT BINDING OPEN SEASON WILL COMMENCE ON JAN 17 AND WILL CONCLUDE ON FEB 16 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
